column3: Well met, friend. I am in charge of storing property lost during the Calamity.
Are you here to reclaim your belongings?

Countless souls went missing during the Calamity, and a veritable mountain of articles was left ownerless. The Adventurers' Guild has been holding such articles in safekeeping in hopes that their owners will one day reclaim them.
Please be warned, however, that we are <Emphasis>not</Emphasis> a storage service. The items you retrieve become your sole responsibility, and cannot be returned to us under any circumstance.
Fewer folk come forward to reclaim their belongings with each passing day.
It saddens me to think that some items will remain in our safekeeping forever, their owners never to return.
